hero.title: Your Journey, Your Way – Safe, Affordable, and Women-Driven
hero.subtitle: NisaDrive provides a dignified and culturally respectful transport experience, offering affordable, tech-powered mobility across urban and remote areas of Pakistan.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose NisaDrive?
whyChoose.subtitle: Experience the difference with Pakistan's most trusted women-to-women transportation service

femaleDrivers.title: Women-Only Drivers
femaleDrivers.description: Trained and verified female drivers ensuring your peace of mind.

pricing.title: Transparent & Fair Pricing
pricing.description: No hidden charges. Standard rates with real-time fare estimates.

safety.title: Geo-Fenced Safety Zones
safety.description: Smart mobility with routes mapped for maximum safety using AI & local intel.

cultural.title: Culturally Aligned Services
cultural.description: Tailored for the social and cultural needs of Pakistani women.

empowerment.title: Empowering Livelihoods
empowerment.description: Enabling thousands of women to earn through driving, delivery, and digital gigs.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Safe & Empowering Travel?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of Pakistani women who trust NisaDrive for their daily transportation needs.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive transportation solutions designed specifically for Pakistani women

student.title: Student Commutes
student.description: Safe, scheduled school and university drop-offs with background-verified women drivers.

professional.title: Professional Transport
professional.description: Reliable transport for working women with ride history, emergency alert features & live tracking.

personal.title: Personal Errands
personal.description: Easy access to healthcare, markets, salons, and home visits – right from your phone.

courier.title: Courier Services
courier.description: Female-managed last-mile delivery for women-centric businesses and home services.

cta.title: Need Any of These Services?
cta.subtitle: Download NisaDrive and access all our services with just a few taps.

community.title: Join the NisaDrive Community
community.subtitle: Be part of Pakistan's first women-to-women mobility platform. Whether you're looking for safe rides, earning opportunities, or business partnerships.

rider.title: Rider
rider.description: Experience safe, reliable transportation with verified female drivers. Book rides, track your journey, and travel with confidence across Pakistan.

driver.title: Driver (Affiliate)
driver.description: Empower yourself with flexible earning opportunities. Join our network of verified female drivers and build your independent business while serving your community.

partner.title: Partner
partner.description: Collaborate with NisaDrive to expand women-centric services. From businesses to organizations, join us in creating safer mobility solutions for Pakistani women.

cta.title: Ready to Be Part of the Change?
cta.subtitle: Download the NisaDrive app today and join thousands of women creating a safer, more empowered Pakistan.

footer.description: Pakistan's first women-to-women ride-hailing service. Safe, reliable, and culturally respectful transportation for women, by women.
footer.disclaimer: NisaDrive is committed to providing safe, reliable, and culturally respectful transportation services for women across Pakistan. We operate with full compliance to local regulations and maintain the highest standards of safety and security. All rides are tracked, drivers are thoroughly vetted, and 24/7 support is available. By using our services, you agree to our terms and conditions.
